Let's think step by step.

| --- |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The best PCE value of 6.33% was obtained from the blend device of PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) , with a short - circuit current density ( J SC ) higher than 16 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 6.33% |
| higher than 16 mA / cm^2 |
| PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

The three Property Value entities identified from the paragraph are:

1. "6.33%" - This is the best PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) value mentioned in the paragraph.
2. "higher than 16 mA / cm^2" - This is the value of the short-circuit current density (J SC) mentioned in the paragraph.
3. "PBDTT-DPP75-TPD25 and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" - This is the blend device that was used to obtain the best PCE value.
